channel.title: Scorned Not Getting Credit
channel.description:
13 Was Possessor who was Occupied two nights.
I Marked him on N2 and we executed him on the stand the next day and I didn't get credit for seeing a marked target executed.
![image|690x99](upload://g9vPr8TrghWMz0I7G7tK0TT1S3h.jpeg)
I was able to mark a different person later and I only got credit for one person and lost the game.
